text:
All of the spanish (es) server error messages are 'semi' translated or textually
translated, which should not be the case. As far as I would say, translations
for errors should be made such that the end user can understand what is going
on. So I am submitting translations that do exactly that.

HTTP:FORBIDDEN:

Content-language: es
Content-type: text/html
Body:----------es--
<!--#set var="TITLE" value="Acceso prohibido!" -->
<!--#include virtual="include/top.html" -->

   <!--#if expr="$REDIRECT_URL = /\/$/" -->

      Usted no tiene permiso para accesar al directorio solicitado.
      No existe un documento índice, o el directorio está
      protegido contra lectura.

  <!--#else -->

      Usted no tiene permiso de accesar al objeto solicitado.
      El objeto está protegido contra lectura, o no
      puede ser leido por el servidor.

  <!--#endif -->

<!--#include virtual="include/bottom.html" -->
----------es--
creator: alejandro@lay.com.mx
